main.java.com.team15.ebrs.dao

Class TripDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.com.team15.ebrs.dao.TripDAO

  • public class TripDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Data Access Object class for Trip. Provides necessary database interaction regarding the specified objects.
    Author:
    Team 15
    See Also:
    Trip, DatabaseConnector

      • TripDAO

        public TripDAO()

    • Method Detail

      • startTrip

        public boolean startTrip(Trip trip)
        Inserts a Trip object into the database with the necessary attributes to start a trip. Some attributes gets added later.
        Parameters:
        trip - this parameter is a Trip object to add to the database.
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if it managed to add trip to database, false if it didn't manage.
        See Also:
        Trip

      • stopTrip

        public boolean stopTrip(Trip trip)
        Updates the rest of the attributes for a trip, these are needed to register that the trip has ended. The trip is not complete in the database until it has ended/ has been updated with these attributes.
        Parameters:
        trip - this parameter is a Trip object updated with all the attributes for a trip.
        Returns:
        a boolean, true if it managed to update trip in the database, false if it didn't manage.
        See Also:
        Trip

      • getBikeDataForTrip

        public java.util.ArrayList<BikeData> getBikeDataForTrip(int tripId)
        Returns the bike data for a specified trip.
        Parameters:
        tripId - this parameter is the trip id for the requested trip in the database.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of BikeData.
        See Also:
        BikeData, BikeDAO

      • getTripId

        public int getTripId(Trip trip)
        Returns the trip id for a specified trip based on time the trip started customer id and bike id. Needed because the trip id is auto increment in the database.
        Parameters:
        trip - this parameter is a Trip object with the needed variables.
        Returns:
        an int for what the trip id is in the database.
        See Also:
        Trip

      • getTripById

        public Trip getTripById(int tripId)
        Returns a Trip object from the database with the corresponding trip id.
        Parameters:
        tripId - this parameter specifies the trip id.
        Returns:
        a Trip object with the specific trip id.
        See Also:
        Trip

      • getAllTrips

        public java.util.ArrayList<Trip> getAllTrips()
        Returns an ArrayList of all Trip objects in the database.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all Trip objects.
        See Also:
        Trip

        Returns an ArrayList of all Trip objects in the database with the specified bike id.
